FuncDef:
The authentication timeout command sets the timeout period for waiting for the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) packets replied by the authentication server.
The undo authentication timeout command restores the default timeout period.
By default, the timeout period for waiting for the EAP packets replied by the authentication server is 30 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the timeout period.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 300, in seconds.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The command sets the timeout period for waiting for the Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) packets replied by the authentication server, in 802.1X authentication.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
